name: Spritzee
description: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.effect: Friendly Pokémon next to this Pokémon in double and triple battles each have a 30% chance of being cured of any major status ailment after each turn.
abilities.description: May heal an ally’s status conditions.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.effect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.
abilities.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.
